Package org.hibernate.search.backend.impl.lucene.works

Interface Summary
LuceneWorkDelegate LuceneWorkDelegate interface.
 

Class Summary
DeleteExtWorkDelegate Extension of DeleteLuceneWork bound to a single entity.
LuceneWorkVisitor  
UpdateExtWorkDelegate This applies the index update operation using the Lucene operation IndexWriter.updateDocument(Term, org.apache.lucene.document.Document, org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer) This is the most efficient way to update the index, but we can apply it only if the Document is uniquely identified by a single term (so no index sharing across entities or Numeric ids).
UpdateWorkDelegate
